titleStmt.title: Description of Benjamin Zucker Family Ketubah Collection, KET Z240: Ketubah, 1920.

notesStmt.note: A large, triangular superscription surmounts the text. A blue and red Star of David, inscribed with the word Shaddai (in Hebrew) appears within and on either side of the superscription.

msContents.textLang: Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE), Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE); Hebrew
